subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=118|rad=竹|as=06|sn=12|canj=HHEQ|four=|ids=⿱𥫗夅}}

# a bamboo basket for food containers (such as cup, plate, dish and bowl
# etc.) used in ancient times
# a basket for chopsticks
# bamboo basket used to filter or to strain out the wine
# a sail made of a thin and long strip of bamboo
